017package org.apache.juneau.bean.atom;
018
019import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.StringUtils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.XmlFormat.*;
021
022import java.net.*;
023
024import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
025import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
026import org.apache.juneau.xml.annotation.*;
027
028/**
029 * Represents an <c>atomGenerator</c> construct in the RFC4287 specification.
030 *
031 * <h5 class='figure'>Schema</h5>
032 * <p class='bschema'>
033 *    atomGenerator = element atom:generator {
034 *       atomCommonAttributes,
035 *       attribute uri { atomUri }?,
036 *       attribute version { text }?,
037 *       text
038 *    }
039 * </p>
040 *
041 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
042 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauBeanAtom">juneau-bean-atom</a>
043 * </ul>
044 */
045@Bean(typeName="generator")
046@FluentSetters
047public class Generator extends Common {
048
049   private URI uri;
050   private String version;
051   private String text;
052
053
054   /**
055    * Normal constructor.
056    *
057    * @param text The generator statement content.
058    */
059   public Generator(String text) {
060      this.text = text;
061   }
062
063   /** Bean constructor. */
064   public Generator() {}
065
066
067   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
068   // Bean properties
069   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
070
071   /**
072    * Bean property getter:  <property>uri</property>.
073    *
074    * <p>
075    * The URI of this generator statement.
076    *
077    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
078    */
079   @Xml(format=ATTR)
080   public URI getUri() {
081      return uri;
082   }
083
084   /**
085    * Bean property setter:  <property>uri</property>.
086    *
087    * <p>
088    * The URI of this generator statement.
089    *
090    * <p>
091    * The value can be of any of the following types: {@link URI}, {@link URL}, {@link String}.
092    * Strings must be valid URIs.
093    *
094    * @param value
095    *    The new value for this property.
096    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
097    * @return This object
098    */
099   public Generator setUri(Object value) {
100      this.uri = toURI(value);
101      return this;
102   }
103
104   /**
105    * Bean property getter:  <property>version</property>.
106    *
107    * <p>
108    * The version of this generator statement.
109    *
110    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
111    */
112   @Xml(format=ATTR)
113   public String getVersion() {
114      return version;
115   }
116
117   /**
118    * Bean property setter:  <property>version</property>.
119    *
120    * <p>
121    * The version of this generator statement.
122    *
123    * @param value
124    *    The new value for this property.
125    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
126    * @return This object
127    */
128   public Generator setVersion(String value) {
129      this.version = value;
130      return this;
131   }
132
133   /**
134    * Bean property getter:  <property>text</property>.
135    *
136    * <p>
137    * The content of this generator statement.
138    *
139    * @return The property value, or <jk>null</jk> if it is not set.
140    */
141   @Xml(format=TEXT)
142   public String getText() {
143      return text;
144   }
145
146   /**
147    * Bean property setter:  <property>text</property>.
148    *
149    * <p>
150    * The content of this generator statement.
151    *
152    * @param value
153    *    The new value for this property.
154    *    <br>Can be <jk>null</jk> to unset the property.
155    * @return This object
156    */
157   public Generator setText(String value) {
158      this.text = value;
159      return this;
160   }
161
162   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
163   // Overridden setters (to simplify method chaining)
164   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
165
166   // <FluentSetters>
167
168   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.bean.atom.Common */
169   public Generator setBase(Object value) {
170      super.setBase(value);
171      return this;
172   }
173
174   @Override /* GENERATED - org.apache.juneau.bean.atom.Common */
175   public Generator setLang(String value) {
176      super.setLang(value);
177      return this;
178   }
179
180   // </FluentSetters>
181}
